pullRequest.title: [Feature] Grading with Static Code Analysis
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.
 Server: I added multiple integration tests (Spring) related to the features (with a high test coverage)
 Server: I documented the Java code using JavaDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple integration tests (Jest) related to the features (with a high test coverage)
 Client: I documented the TypeScript code using JSDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes
 Client: I translated all the newly inserted strings into German and English

Motivation and Context


This PR integrates static code analysis into the grading system.
Description


Server

Score Generation: Applying penalties from SCA categories for SCA feedbacks
Filter feedback for invisible SCA categories
The 'updatedTestCases' flag of a programming exercise is now also used to indicate updated categories


Client

SCA categories are loaded from the server
The 'test-case-service' is now named 'grading-service'
Save & Reset Buttons are now separate for both tables (test-cases and categories)
All grading-related messages are adjusted to include the category variant.
The category table is updated to handle the category state
The 'updatedTestCase' flag is inside the component used as 'updatedGradingConfig'



Steps for Testing


Log in to Artemis
Create a Programming Exercise with Static Code Analysis enabled
Configure Test Cases and SCA Categories through the grading page.
Participate in the exercise and view the result + feedback.
Edit the grading configuration, recalculate the score and view the result change as a student.

Set more categories to 'Graded', apply higher penalties and re-evaluate the scores -> Score should decrease
Set categories to 'Inactive' -> Feedbacks in this category should not be visible anymore
Set categories back to 'Feedback' or 'Graded' and re-trigger all builds -> Feedbacks should be visible again



Test Coverage




Screenshots

commit.message: add server test case for score calculation

nodes.bodyText: This JavaDoc should be stored in the corresponding interface.
this is unreadable and not understandable. Please do not abuse the stream API and simplify this code so that it is easier to understand!
please add some inline comments what you are doing here! Otherwise the code is hard to understand!

commit.message: Merge branch 'feature/programming-exercise/sca-grading' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into feature/programming-exercise/sca-grading

nodes.bodyText: All feedback which is currently invisible will be removed and not saved in the database if I understand this right. This has the advantage that feedback doesn't need to be filtered when sending it to the client but also makes a proper re-evaluate impossible.
I think this information should be added when the feedback is generated.

I don't think this condition does what is supposed to do. If programmingExercise.getMaxStaticCodeAnalysisPenalty() is null, the user does not want to apply a limit. Here 0>0 is false and the grading won't take place.

I think the testCasePoints need to be capped first and then the penalty is subtracted. Imagine bonusPoints+maxPoints = 20. Temporarily, a student can get more test case points e.g. 30 in this calculation and then the subtracted penalty would not have any effect.
I think a division by zero is possible here.
I think programmingExercise.getMaxStaticCodeAnalysisPenalty() could be null and this needs to be checked.

It might be possible to store the mappings in a more efficient way. For example a Map with keys Pair<Tool,Rule> and values the category names. This must only be created once at startup. This can also be done in a follow-up.

commit.message: Streamline client and server enum names
Switch order of capping and comments
Default to 100% maxPenalty if no penalty was given. Add doc.
Add more tests and improve structure
Bump expected amount of feedback by one because of new category
add grading service and grading resource
Fix import for test cases and categories
Refactor and improve integration tests for import
Use floating point numbers for penalties to allow fine grained control
Max penalty for exercises should be integers
add code analysis in exercise grading
Create input for max static code analysis penalty
Show the max penalty in exercise details
Complete default java static code configuration
adjust tests and fix code issues
use correct exercise on category creation
Merge branch 'feature/programming-exercise/sca-grading' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into feature/programming-exercise/sca-grading

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/develop' into feature/checkstyle-and-pmd-support

# Conflicts:
#	src/test/java/de/tum/in/www1/artemis/util/DatabaseUtilService.java
move buttons into tab area and update status
use testCasesChanged flat also for sca categories
hide penalty field on ungraded category
add basic table for static code analysis categories
move inactive checkbox inside tab body
Adapt StaticCodeAnalysisReportDTO to reflect changes in the notification plugin
Save additional static code analysis feedback attributes
Log created static code analysis feedback
Store student working directory in yml. Set it into the POM and use it to cut source paths for static code analysis
Fix checkstyle file name and use google checks
Handle 403 on retrieving build logs for result details component
Store static code analysis issue in JSON format
Merge branch 'feature/checkstyle-and-pmd-support' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into feature/checkstyle-and-pmd-support

Do not include empty values when serializing issue
Store student working directory as a Constant
Add entities for static code analysis configuration

Revert "Database changes"

This reverts commit ac03c6c2
Add repo, service, repository and first integration test
hide tabs when sca is disabled
Implement update of static code analysis categories
Refactor and extend static code analysis setting validation
Read in the default configuration for static code analysis on application startup
improve feedback generation in bamboo service
Add integration realistic integration test with static code analysis
More integration tests for update functionality
fix feedback generation in jenkins service
remove non-functional retrieveLatestResult methods in CIServices
